single_captions:.video_content: A woman with long, light brown hair is showcasing a craft tutorial. She is wearing a denim jacket and a white beaded necklace. In one hand, she holds a small round, red plastic container with a screw cap removed, while in the other, she holds a yellow hot glue gun with a metallic nozzle. The video progresses to demonstrate the process of applying hot glue, with the nozzle of the glue gun aimed toward the container. Throughout the video, there is text in another language, written in bold white characters, appearing near the top and bottom portions of the scene.
